title: [Kharam-Dzu, Poor Quarter]
description: A pall of soot hangs in the air like a greasy black cloud.  The ramshackle housing is ill-kept, the windows boarded up or broken.  Dwarves clad in rags shuffle along without looking up.  From under a pile of rotting planks, a mangy cat stares out at you with dull red eyes.

A pall of soot hangs in the air like a greasy black cloud.  The ramshackle housing is ill-kept, the windows boarded up or broken.  Dwarves clad in rags shuffle along without looking up.  From the shadows under a pile of rotting planks, a mangy cat stares out at you with dull red eyes.
